title: Howard Marks: This Time It's Different
text: In his most recent memo, investor Howard Marks (Trades, Portfolio) touches on a number of reasons why the commonly heard refrain of "It’s really different this time" is likely to not hold.

title: Tom Russo: 2 Lessons I Learned From Warren Buffett
text: Tom Russo (Trades, Portfolio) is a Managing Member of Gardner Russo & Gardner and a General Partner of Sempre Vic Partners.

title: Velodyne Lidar hires bankers for an IPO: Business Insider
text: Autonomous vehicle technology company Velodyne Lidar has hired bankers for an initial public offering, Business Insider reported on Saturday, citing sources familiar with the process.

title: Trump reportedly approved cyber strike to knock out Iranian computers that control missile launches
text: President Trump reportedly approved a cyber strike that disabled Iranian computer systems.

title: The Fed could cut rates four times over the next 12 months because of low inflation
text: "Trust the market. It wants a lot of rate cuts," Bianco Research's James Bianco says.

title: A Sophisticated Investor's Approach To Climate Change: The Case Of LGIM
text: Legal & General Investment Management's "Climate Impact Pledge" is an excellent example of how an investor can address the issue of climate change. It is a combination of carrots and sticks to improve a company's climate performance for the benefit of the company, its investors, and the world.

title: Barron's Picks And Pans: Humana, Marriott, Boeing And More
text: This weekend's Barron’s cover story looks at the low-interest rate world. In “How to Navigate a World of Easy Money,” Avi Salzman and Nicholas Jasinski look at how investors are having to adjust.

title: The Week Ahead In Biotech: Conferences, PDUFA Dates, Clinical Trial Readouts And IPOs
text: Biotech stocks came made upward moves last week after a rangebound period.

title: Toys ‘R’ Us to open new stores ahead of the holidays
text: The makers of Little Tikes, Bratz dolls and L.O.L. Surprise! toys are signing on as the owners of Toys “R” Us gear up to open new stores in time for the holidays.

title: Bill Gates on making “one of the greatest mistakes of all time”
text: At a recent event hosted for founders by the venture firm Village Global, one of its most prominent investors, Bill Gates, sat down with Eventbrite cofounder and CEO Julia Hartz to discuss founding a company and the tough decisions necessary at nearly every turn in order to create and sustain a thriving enterprise.

title: Bitcoin Has Surpassed $11,000 To Climb 250% From December Low
text: Bitcoin continued to climb today, rising above $11,000. When will the world's largest cryptocurrency by market value reach its next milestone?

title: North American Oil Drillers' Shareholder-Friendly Antics Making Deleveraging Harder
text: There is a heightened focus by exploration and production firms on stakeholder returns and that carries its own set of operational constraints.

title: Inside Trump's $50 billion economic plan for Mideast peace
text: The Trump administration's Middle East economic plan calls for creation of a global investment fund to lift Palestinian and neighboring Arab state economies, and construction of a $5 billion transportation corridor to connect the West Bank and Gaza.

title: Strait of Hormuz attacks require an 'international response': US envoy to Iran
text: The international community must do more to ensure maritime security in the world's busiest transit lane for seaborne oil shipments, according to the U.S. special representative to Iran.

title: Sunseap CEO remains positive on China's solar market despite oversupply
text: Frank Phuan of Sunseap Group discusses how the company is differentiating itself from the majority of the domestic players in China as the solar market recovers.

title: Iran is a 'corrupt religious mafia,' the US envoy to Iran says
text: Brian Hook discusses the sanctions on Iran by the United States and the next steps by the U.S. administration.

title: Oil tanker attacks in the Strait of Hormuz requires an 'international response,' US envoy says
text: Six oil tankers and a U.S. spy drone have been attacked since May either in, or near, the Strait of Hormuz.

title: Trump says he will discuss Iran tensions at Camp David: 'We want to be proportionate'
text: “We are moving forward with additional sanctions on Iran,” Trump told reporters as he was departing for Camp David.  “They’re going on slowly and in some cases pretty rapidly.”

title: We will increase our sanctions on Iran: US envoy to Iran
text: We will continue with our foreign policy here, says Brian Hook.

title: Investing Insights: Funds for Yield, A Networking Stock and More..
text: In this week’s podcast, Josh Aguilar on whether 3M is a good stock for dividend seekers, Christine Benz discusses what’s missing from her streamlined 3-funds portfolios, Nick Watson with an attractive small-cap value fund, Russ Kinnel shares his three favorite actively managed world-stock funds, Matthew Dolgin offers a best idea in networking, and Alex Bryan with three diverse funds for yield seekers.

title: Bill Gates and Big Oil back company trying to solve climate change by sucking CO2 out of the air
text: Carbon Engineering wants to address climate change by capturing and removing carbon dioxide straight from the air, but many question whether partnering with oil and gas companies is the right move.

title: The Federal Reserve has another option besides rate cuts to battle a slowdown
text: The central bank could end the reduction of its balance sheet ahead of schedule, a move that would add further stimulus to the U.S. economy.

title: $11 Trillion In Bonds Yield Less Than Zero. Does It Matter?
text: A huge amount of government bonds are trading at negative rates, which means that holders expect to lose money, and yet they buy them. But this may not mean much: the level of interest rates seems to bear little influence over the economy.

title: Startups Weekly: The scooter cash desert
text: In this week's newsletter: Slack's direct listing, Juul's conundrum and Facebook's new cryptocurrency.

title: Investor Karen Firestone: What the pros do when they are underperforming (other than panic)
text: So, when you're underperforming and tempted to ditch your entire stock list for whatever is advancing that week, take a deep breath.

title: Trump On Tariffs: Clueless
text: President Trump doesn’t like U. S. trade deficits.
